meaning_str.bing: n. 工业；行业；勤奋；生产制造

工业；行业；勤奋；生产制造

勤奋；勤劳；工业；产业；行业；领域；行当；业界；企业界；生产制造；专业研究；辛勤工作

1.en: Artists of 'Post-Graffiti' bring her to the field of cultural industry with latest technology and a variety of materials.
1.cn: 艺术家运用新的科技与多元媒材开创具体的形式概念，将涂鸦艺术带向文化产业的领域。

2.en: According to industry analysis, now began to highlight children's wear industry as a whole, did not come easily.
2.cn: 据业内人士分析，如今渐渐凸显的童装行业整体力量，其实来之不易。

3.en: The store (or "maison" , as the industry likes to call it) screamed out a new symphony of the three main forms of status.
3.cn: 那家商店（奢侈品行业喜欢称为“品牌屋”）把获得地位的三条主要途径重新组合在一起，谱写出一曲新的交响乐。

0.en: It's an industry worth an estimated $1.5 billion a year.
0.cn: 这是个每年创造大约十五亿美元产值的工业。

1.en: The device I'm about to introduce to you is gonna revolutionize an entire industry.
1.cn: 我正要介绍给你们的这个设备将会引发整个工业界的一场革命。

2.en: This is what America's auto industry looked like in 1980. Each dot is a factory run by a U.S. automaker.
2.cn: 这就像是1980年时的美国汽车工业，每个汽车工厂都是美国经营的。

3.en: That's six times more than any other country. But historically, this enormous industry has been plagued by inefficiency.
3.cn: 这是其他国家的六倍，但是历史上这一大工业曾被低效率困扰着。

4.en: This is the Queen's award for industry. Thank you. Keep up the good work. Three cheers for Miss Rabbit.
4.cn: 这是女王为工业颁发的奖项！谢谢！继续保持优秀的工作，让我们给兔子小姐三声欢呼！

5.en: More jobs, more insured, a growing economy, Shrinking deficits, bustling industry, booming energy.
5.cn: 更多的就业岗位，更多的投保人，不断增长的经济，削减中的赤字，蒸蒸日上的工业，蓬勃发展中的能源产业。

6.en: This is the Queen's award for industry. Thank you. Keep up the good work. Three cheers for Miss Rabbit. Hip, hip. Hooray. Hip, hip. Hooray. Hip. Hip. Hip. Hooray.
6.cn: 这是女王为工业颁发的奖项！谢谢！继续保持优秀的工作，让我们给兔子小姐三声欢呼！耶！好耶！耶，耶！好耶！耶！耶！耶！好耶！

7.en: It's a term that came out of the car industry.

8.en: If an industry can not live more than 3 years, if all the companies can not live happily for 3 years, this industry is(will) never become the mainstream.
8.cn: 如果一个行业不能活得超过3年，如果不是所有的公司能够快乐地生存超过3年，那这个行业永远无法成为主流。

9.en: In aerospace, the military, we will own the entire robotics industry.
9.cn: 这可以应用在航太和军事我们将称霸机器人产业。

10.en: But we chose to invest in American auto industry and American workers.
10.cn: 但我们选择投资于美国的汽车产业和美国的产业工人。

11.en: Your earth is a very small part of a very large industry. Feel my skin.
11.cn: 地球只是一个大企业体系中的一小部份。摸摸我的皮肤。

12.en: The auto industry we rescued is on track for its strongest year since 2005.
12.cn: 我们所拯救的汽车产业正处于自2005年以来最好的时候。

13.en: It's been a major boost to our economy and a profound change to our auto industry.
13.cn: 成为了我们经济的巨大推动力量，并促进了我国汽车行业的深化改革。

14.en: And in the 1980s, America's steel industry simply collapsed, costing over 300,000 jobs.
14.cn: 在80年代美国钢产业倒闭了，空出来300000多个工作岗位。

15.en: America was built on the spirit of industry. You build your future. It isn't handed to you.
15.cn: 美国的根基是勤劳精神，未来靠自己努力，而非靠人施予。

16.en: The government will then send Sacks Industry a blank check and I'm going to be rich, like, stupid rich.
16.cn: 然后政府就将会给萨克斯集团， 一张任我填写的支票，之后我就会变富有， 非常的富有。

17.en: Sure, most of the leaders in every industry were men, but we thought changing that was just a matter of time.
17.cn: 没错，大部分行业的领袖都是男性。但改变应该只是时间问题。

18.en: This industry can never become the deep economy, so, what we want to do is that how we can find this solution.
18.cn: 这个行业永远不可能深深根植于经济，所以，我们要做什么才能找到解决方案?

19.en: The food industry is in the business of creating desirable commodities, and we're in the business of eating a lot.
19.cn: 食品业就是为了制造吸引顾客的商品，而我们的工作就是吃。大吃特吃。
